required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of Oral Health Related Quality of Life After Full Mouth Rehabilitation Under GA
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of Oral Health Related Quality of Life After Full Mouth Rehabilitation Under General Anesthesia in a Group of Egyptian Children Below 5 Years Old (A Before and After Study)

brief_summary.textblock: To assess Oral health related quality of life (OHRQOL) after full mouth rehabilitation under GA in a group of Egyptian children below 5 years

primary_outcome.measure: Oral health related quality of life (OHRQOL)
primary_outcome.time_frame: change from baseline oral health related quality of life at 6 months
primary_outcome.description: Oral health related quality of life (OHRQOL) will be measured by validated questionnaire which is : Early Childhood Oral Health Impact Scale (ECOHIS) . the unit of measurement is likert scale.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: change of baseline body mass at 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Children's weights will be measured in kilograms and heights in meters .Body max index (BMI) will be calculated using this formula: BMI = weight (kg) / height (m)Â² to report BMI in kg/m^2

intervention.description: full mouth rehabilitation under general anesthesia

study_pop.textblock: Caregivers paired with their children attending Pediatric Dentistry and Dental Public Health department, faculty of dentistry, Cairo University Egypt

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age range 2 to 5 years .
- Children with untreated early childhood caries .
- Children who will undergo dental treatment under general anesthesia.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participation in any other concurrent clinical trials.
- The presence of serious medical conditions or a transmissible disease such as malignant disease, hepatitis, AIDS etc.
- Children with special healthcare needs.
- Children whose parents had no home or mobile phone to enable postoperative contact.
- Parent that will not sign the consent.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Doctor Eyman sheikh eldin mokhtar pedodontist principle investigator
